1.0.2.name: wordpress/xhanch-my-prayer-time
1.0.2.description:
Xhanch - My Prayer Time is a WordPress plugin made by Xhanch Studio to display Moslem/Islamic prayer time table based on visitor's IP (daily and monthly).

It provide a widget to display a daily prayer time, a shortcode to be placed on a page to display a monthly prayer time and a print version monthly prayer time.

Click here for more detailed information about Xhanch - My Prayer Time and If you're having a problem with the plugin

Click here to see All free plugins from Xhanch Studio
